NetAspect

An open source AOP framework for .Net and .Net Compact Framework

What is AOP ?

The principle is well explained : here

Why NetAspect ?

For this :

  • NetAspect is simple
  • NetAspect is open source
  • NetAspect does not force you to have dependencies at execution time
  • NetAspect is compliant with any .Net Framework (including compact framework)
